EDIT.TITLE: Entering Posting Session
EDIT.JUSTIFICATION: Please provide a justification for your edits.
EDIT.PIN: Enter your PIN to confirm your identity.
EDIT.INVALID_SESSION: This session has expired due to too many invalid attempts.  Please see an administrator to reset your PIN or try again.

CASH_PURCHASE.TITLE: Purchase Order Dispense
CASH_PURCHASE.NOT_FOUND: No pending purchase order records found.

EXCHANGE.TITLE: Configure Exchange Rates
EXCHANGE.HELP_TXT_1: The exchange rate module provides the facilty to set daily exchange rates. In order to ensure data integrity, an exchange rate for all functional currencies must be set daily
EXCHANGE.NO_RATES: There are no rates set for today!

PROJECT.TITLE: Project Management
PROJECT.HELP_TXT_1: This page is for managment of projects belonging to enterprises.  You see here all projects currently registered to your current enterprise.

PERMISSION.TITLE: Users & Permissions Management
PERMISSION.HELP_TXT_1: Edit existing users and permissions from the table to the left
PERMISSION.HELP_TXT_4: Deletes a user and their permissions

TRIAL_BALANCE.TITLE: Trial Balance
TRIAL_BALANCE.ERROR_TEXT: Errors detected in the trial balance.

FISCAL_YEAR.TITLE: Fiscal Year
FISCAL_YEAR.HELP_TXT: This utility facilitates the creation and management of fiscal years. The following operations are available
FISCAL_YEAR.NAME: Name
FISCAL_YEAR.ALERT_ONE: There are no Fiscal Years recorded for the enterprise
FISCAL_YEAR.ALERT_TWO: . Fiscal Years are required to group transactions and provide reports.
FISCAL_YEAR.EDIT: Edit selected fiscal year; lock and unlock periods and view opening balances.

ENTERPRISE.TITLE: Enterprise Management
ENTERPRISE.NAME: Name
ENTERPRISE.HELP_TEXT_1: Manage the application's enterprises from here.  There is currently no facility for deleting enterprises.

GROUPS.ALERT: This module will help you to create groupe for your inventories

PCASH.TITLE: Enterprise Cash Payments
PCASH.SOME_REPORT: Summary Report of Last Payments (limit 20 items)
PCASH.DESCRIPTION: This module allows you to execute all operations belonging to the principal cashbox of the enterprise. Use this module to manage income and expenses with confidence.

INCOME.TITLE: Enterprise Cash Payments : Income
INCOME.INFO: This module is responsible for automising the importation of income.  Use this module to debit the enterprise cashbox by transactions and other forms of income.

NO_EXCHANGE.TITLE: Missing Exchange Rate
NO_EXCHANGE.EXPLANATION: This module requires an exchange rate.  There is no exchange rate set for today.
NO_EXCHANGE.FIX: Please return to the exchange rate module and set a new exchange rate.

PATIENT_REG.INVALID_DATE: Warning                    : Date of Birth is in the Future! Are you sure it is correct?

ACCOUNT.HELP_TXT_2: Account information and relationshions are shown in the table on the right
ACCOUNT.HELP_TXT_3: Click 'Add Account' to add an account

GROUP_INVOICE.TITLE: Debtor Group Invoicing
GROUP_INVOICE.HELP_TXT_1: Choose a convention from the upper left hand corner of the screen
GROUP_INVOICE.ERROR_TXT_1: Check that everything is correctly entered

CASH.TITLE: Cash Payment Module
CASH.HELP_TXT_1: The module allows debitors to pay against existing invoices
CASH.HELP_TXT_2: To begin, search for a debitor using the search bar above

OVER.TITLE: Justification for Payment
OVER.CUED: The debtor has been billed this amount
OVER.PAYMENT: The debitor is paying a this amount
OVER.JUSTIFICATION: Please include a justification for the payment on the debitor's account

CURRENCY.TITLE: Currency Management
CURRENCY.HELP_TXT_1: Configure the application's currencies and rendering from this module
CURRENCY.SYMBOL_TXT: the symbol with which the currency is identified and rendered.  Appears after the amount
CURRENCY.SEPARATOR_TXT: the delimiter used to denote the thousands places in an amount
CURRENCY.DECIMAL_TXT: the delimiter used between the integer parts of an amount and the decimal parts

PATIENT_GRP.TITLE: Patient Group Management
PATIENT_GRP.HELP_TXT_1: Patient groups are uses to assign the appropriate discounts to types of patients that merit them.  Use this module to register, modify, and remove patient groups and their benefits

DEBITOR_GRP.TITLE: Debitor Group Management
DEBITOR_GRP.HELP_TXT_1: This interface allows you to review, find, and configure debitor groups
DEBITOR_GRP.HELP_TXT_3: Lock the selected debitor group.  No new transactions can be recorded for a locked group

PRICE_LIST.TITLE: Price List Management
PRICE_LIST.HELP_TXT_1: Select an action on the left to edit pricelist properties
PRICE_LIST.UNABLE_TO_DELETE: Price list cannot be deleted - it may currently be assigned to patient/ debtor groups

SALE.TITLE: Create Patient Invoice
SALE.RECOVER_INFO: [Sale Recovered] It is important to note ONLY sale items and quantities are recovered, previously set prices are reset to the inventory default

COUNTRY.TITLE: Country Management
COUNTRY.DESCRIPTION: This module will help you to manage countries. At the left you see available countries and their locations. Use this module to create, modify, and remove countries.

PROVINCE.TITLE: Province Manager
PROVINCE.NAME: Name
PROVINCE.DESCRIPTION: This module will help you to manage provinces, at the left you see available provinces and their locations. Use this module to create, modify and remove provinces.

SECTOR.TITLE: Sector Manager
SECTOR.NAME: Name
SECTOR.INFO: This module will help you to manage sector, use this module to create, edit and remove sector

VILLAGE.TITLE: Village Manager
VILLAGE.NAME: Name
VILLAGE.INFO: This module will help you to manage villge, use this module to create, edit and remove village

SERVICE.TITLE: Services Management
SERVICE.INFO_DESCRIPTION: This feature will help you to manage your services (creating, editing and suppressing as well as consulting)

ANALYSIS_CENTER.TITLE: Cost center
ANALYSIS_CENTER.INFO_DESCRIPTION: This feature will help you to manage your cost center(creating, editing, deleting as well as consultating)

MAIN.TITLE: Stock Management

MAIN.WAREHOUSE_INFO_2: All Stock operations (entry, exit and reports) will be assigned to this depot.
